sentences.english: I'm a little teapot, short and stout.
sentences.chinese: 我是一把小茶壺，矮矮又胖胖的小鬼。

sentences.english: He had difficulty holding the teapot steady when he poured the tea.
sentences.chinese: 當他倒茶時他很難拿穩茶壺。

sentences.english: The tea-pot was brown with yellow bands.
sentences.chinese: 茶壺是褐色帶黃色條紋的。

sentences.english: She instinctively catches the pot with a lightning-fast move.
sentences.chinese: 她閃電般本能地接住了茶壺。

sentences.english: And I’d also like to get a Chinese teapot.
sentences.chinese: 我還想買一隻中國茶壺。

sentences.english: I’d also like to get a Chinese teapot.
sentences.chinese: 我還想買一隻中國茶壺。

sentences.english: The teapot should be warmed by pouring in a little boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 應倒進一點滾開的水把茶壺燙熱。

sentences.english: This beautiful teapot is made of purple clay.
sentences.chinese: 這個漂亮的茶壺是用紫砂燒製而成的。

sentences.english: She tried to prize the lid out of the teapot.
sentences.chinese: 她試圖啓開茶壺的蓋子。

sentences.english: Little Tony broke the spout off the teapot.
sentences.chinese: 小唐尼把茶壺嘴打下來了。

sentences.english: Ms. Tison gently swirls the teapot while the tea is steeping to make sure she mixes all the tea with the water.
sentences.chinese: 蒂松輕輕地搖動茶壺，使茶葉在熱水中充分浸泡。

sentences.english: I’m a little teapot, short and stout.
sentences.chinese: 我是一把小茶壺，矮矮胖胖。

sentences.english: Chinese go provides the origin for the design inspiration of this set of teapot.
sentences.chinese: 這套茶壺設計靈感來自中國的圍棋。

sentences.english: In England people still make tea in teapots .
sentences.chinese: 在英國人們仍在茶壺裏沏茶。

sentences.english: He wants to plug up spout of tea pot and place it on fire.
sentences.chinese: 有一次他堵住一個茶壺的壺嘴然後放到火上。

sentences.english: The teapot lid doesnt' take off easily.

definition: to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
cupboard/cupboard that can also be used as a table/sideboard
calabash or bottle gourd (Lagenaria siceraria)/hoist/generic term for block and tackle (or parts thereof)/muddled/(poker) full house
see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
